## Description {#details}

<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/foldingsettrait">FoldingSetTrait</a> - This trait class is used to define behavior of how to &quot;profile&quot; (in the <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/foldingset">FoldingSet</a> parlance) an object of a given type.

The default behavior is to invoke a &#39;Profile&#39; method on an object, but through template specialization the behavior can be tailored for specific types. Combined with the <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/foldingsetnodewrapper">FoldingSetNodeWrapper</a> class, one can add objects to FoldingSets that were not originally designed to have that behavior.

Definition at line 263 of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/adt/foldingset-h">FoldingSet.h</a>.

</DoxygenPage>
